description: Notifies that a FLOGI is denied on an F port of the local device.

event.Summary: FLOGI denied on local F port

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmFPortDenyNotify IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginPWWN s EXAMPLEE H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginIntf i 9999 H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginTime t 31536000

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The pWWN of the device whose FLOGI(Fabric Login) request had
been denied. If the device is an n-node, the value of the instance
of h3cFcPsmLoginSWWN should be zero-length string.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginPWWN

description: The ifindex of the port where the login was denied.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginIntf

description: Specifies the value of SysUpTime when the last denied login
happened.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginTime

description: Notifies that a switch is denied on an E port of the local device.

event.Summary: Switch denied on local E port

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmEPortDenyNotify IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginSWWN s EXAMPLEE H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginIntf i 9999 H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginTime t 31536000

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The sWWN of the device whose FLOGI request had been denied.
If the device is a switch, the values of the instance of
h3cFcPsmLoginPWWN and h3cFcPsmLoginNWWN should be zero-length
string.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginSWWN

description: The ifindex of the port where the login was denied.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginIntf

description: Specifies the value of SysUpTime when the last denied login
happened.
variables.name: H3C-FC-PSM-MIB::h3cFcPsmLoginTime
